name: Goëtica
description:
Göetica is a historical fantasy RPG, in which a young hermetic wizard must explore the province, discover ruins, search for alchemical essences, consort with demons and improve his arcane capabilities, while roaming in a fantastic version of the Kingdom of Saxony in the 17th century, in order to face a supernatural power that wants to possess him, and his former masters who want to judge him.

The game will feature an overland map to traverse between the locations, wich will be navigated through interactive menus, decorated with evocative images. Dungeons will be explored through an isometric view, with a turn-based gameplay.

The player will make pacts with several demons, who will grant them spells. These spells can be fueled by any of four alchemical essences (Albedo, Nigredo, Citrinitas and Rubedo), which add a special effect to the casting. Improving their relationship with each demon, they will be able to unlock their spell tree.
